PTFs might be required for toleration support or exploitation of IBM z16 features and functions. b. Support statement varies based on Linux on IBM Z distribution and release. c. For SLES12/RHEL7/Ubuntu 16.04 and later, Linux kernel supports 256 cores without SMT and 128 cores with SMT
